name: Analyze Team Capacity
description:
Analyze team capacity, workload distribution, and identify bottlenecks or skill gaps. Provides insights into team utilization and availability.

** WHEN TO USE **
- Before planning sprints or assigning new work
- To identify overloaded or underutilized team members
- To find skill bottlenecks (single points of failure)
- To forecast team capacity for upcoming work
- To understand current team availability

** TIMEFRAMES **
- current: Snapshot of current capacity
- week: Next 7 days capacity
- sprint: Next 2 weeks
- month: Next 30 days

** WHAT IT ANALYZES **
- Current load per team member
- Available capacity (hours and percentage)
- Skill distribution and coverage
- Bottlenecks (>80% capacity)
- Skill gaps (skills needed but not available)
- Utilization trends

** RETURNS **
- Total team capacity (hours)
- Used vs available capacity
- Per-member breakdown with load percentages
- List of bottlenecked team members
- Skill gap analysis
- Recommendations for capacity management

** EXAMPLE **
{
  "timeframe": "sprint",
  "includeSkillGaps": true
}

Returns: Team: 120h total, 68h used (57%), Sarah 85% (bottleneck), skill gap: only Mike knows DevOps

teamMembers.description: Optional: Analyze only specific team member IDs
